links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..125
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=sum((2^(4*j-n+1)*sum((2*i+2*j-n)^n*binomial(n-2*j,i)*(-1)^(n-j-i),i,0,((n-2*j)/2)))/(n-2*j)!,j,0,((n-1)/2)); [From Vladimir Kruchinin, May 29 2011](PARI) x='x+O('x^66); /* that many terms */Vec(serlaplace(exp(sin(x)*cos(x))))  /* show terms */ /* Joerg Arndt, May 29 2011 */
